caption: Software Inventory Info
description: Software Inventory Info events report device software inventory data that is either logged or proactively collected. For example, when collecting device information from a CMDB or running a network sweep of connected devices.
name: software_info

device.description: The device that is being discovered by an inventory process.

package.description: The device software that is being discovered by an inventory process.

product.description: Additional product attributes that have been discovered or enriched from a catalog or other external source.
